German[edit]

German Wikipedia has an article on:
Wochenende
Wikipedia de

Etymology[edit]

From Woche +‎ -n- +‎ Ende, calque of English weekend.

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˈvɔχn̩ˌʔɛndə/
  		• (file)
  • (Austria)
    		(file)
  • Hyphenation: Wo‧chen‧en‧de

Noun[edit]

Wochenende n (genitive Wochenendes, plural Wochenenden)

  1. weekend (break in the working week, usually Saturday and Sunday)

Declension[edit]

Declension of Wochenende

indef.def.noundef.noun
nominativeeindasWochenendedieWochenenden
genitiveeinesdesWochenendesderWochenenden
dativeeinemdemWochenendedenWochenenden
